data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Minaei, Kambiz, Mound, Laurence (2010): Grass-flower thrips of the genus Chirothrips (Thysanoptera: Thripidae), with a key to species from Iran. Zootaxa 2411: 33-43, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.294003
